text: Wo rɔ, mɔɔ mɛn wa jamarili ɲinilu do tiɲan, hali jamarili mɛn ma bon a tɔilu bɛɛ ri, ka mɔɔilu fanan karan jamarili wo tiɲanna, wo tii ri jate bɛɛ rɔ dɔɔmanni ri Harijeene Mansaya rɔ. Kɔni mɔɔ mɛn wa jamarili ɲinilu labato, ka mɔɔilu fanan karan woilu labatola, wo tii ri jate mɔɔba ri Harijeene Mansaya rɔ.
